---
title: "package setup"
---

From  https://mc-stan.org/cmdstanr/articles/cmdstanr.html:

```{r}
if (!require("cmdstanr")) {
    install.packages("cmdstanr", repos = c("https://mc-stan.org/r-packages/", getOption("repos")))
}
check_cmdstan_toolchain(fix = TRUE, quiet = TRUE)
```

Installing the `cmdstan` tool chain: see [here](https://mc-stan.org/docs/cmdstan-guide/cmdstan-installation.html#cpp-toolchain)
library(posterior)
```
https://mc-stan.org/docs/cmdstan-guide/cmdstan-installation.html#cpp-toolchain

```{r}
pkgs <- c("lme4", "brms", "broom.mixed", "dplyr", "purrr", "tidybayes", "bayesplot", "ggplot2", "posterior")
ip <- installed.packages()
pkgs <- setdiff(pkgs, rownames(ip))
if (length(pkgs)>0) install.packages(pkgs)
```
